arts.sum: FC Copenhagen and Borussia Dortmund clash in the UEFA Champions League on Tuesday evening. The hosts will be searching for their first victory in this season’s UCL while the visitors aim to maintain their unbeaten European start. arts.ttl: Copenhagen vs. Borussia Dortmund: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund have a chance to quickly put Saturday's Klassiker defeat behind them and continue their unbeaten start to the UEFA Champions League's league phase when they travel to Copenhagen on Tuesday (kick-off: 9.00pm CEST). Borussia have netted four goals in successive Champions League matches for the first time since the 2014/15 group stage, when they did so in back-to-back games against Galatasaray.

Kobenhavn are going through a somewhat turbulent period, winning only two of their last eight matches. They are far from the top of the Danish Superliga table and have only managed one point in their ...
